projectGridLines.title: Product Management Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Product Management Intern

As a product intern, you will indulge in doing product development from concept to implementation

What you will do -

1. Perform product research to understand customer needs/behaviours and identify pain-points through user

research.

2. Get good understanding of the brand(s) the problem needs to be solved for, to be able to provide good

solutions and implement the solutions

3. Analyze the data and identify trends to craft workable strategies. These strategies are recommendations for

improvements to the current business and product strategy.

4. Discuss it with other group members, define goals for the internship and get it validated from your mentor.

5. Work cross-functionally with teams to execute product launches

6. Showcase the implementation to your mentor and the leadership


B.Tech or M.Tech student in Computer Science, IT, Electronics or related field with outstanding academic

record

Strong communication and interpersonal skills

Available to do a full-time internship in office for 24 weeks starting Jul 2024

Strong analytical, problem solving and quantitative skills
